title: As Trump pressures Fed, Supreme Court weighs his bid to fire board governor Lisa Cook
full_text: As Trump pressures Fed, Supreme Court weighs his bid to fire board governor Lisa Cook. As President Trump mounts a campaign to control the Federal Reserve, the Supreme Court is considering his ability to remove a member of the Fed's governing board.. As President Donald Trump mounts an unprecedented campaign to control the Federal Reserve, the U.S. Supreme Court on Wednesday is considering the scope of a major check on his ability to remove a mem… [+9507 chars]
